verses.name: Numbers 29:27
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:28
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:29
verses.text: And on the sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:30
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
